titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, Undated [See also Tape 1]

mods.tableOfContents: Carnegie Victory Dancers, including: Mr. and Mrs. Lucien Rice, Benny Franklin, Spencer Asah. Carnegie Victory Club. Round Dances. Kiowa Eagle Dance. Kiowa Shield Dance. Fast War Dance (short). 49'er Dance (short). War Dances. Round Dances. Gourd Dance. Song to Honor the Brave
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
